item.title: Possible issues with running ClickHouse in k8s
item.description: The biggest problem with running ClickHouse in k8s, happens when clickhouse-server can’t start for some reason and pod is falling in CrashloopBackOff, so you can’t easily get in the pod and check/fix/restart ClickHouse. There is multiple possible reasons for this, some of them can be fixed without manual intervention in pod: Wrong configuration files Fix: Check templates which are being used for config file generation and fix them. While upgrade some backward incompatible changes prevents ClickHouse from start.
